articles.title: “Hearing Car” Detects Sounds for Safer Driving
articles.summary: Autonomous vehicles have eyes—cameras, lidar, radar. But ears? That’s what researchers at Fraunhofer Institute for Digital Media Technology’s Oldenburg Branch for Hearing, Speech and Audio Technology in Germany are building with the Hearing Car. articles.title: IEEE Collabratec Reaches 100,000 Member Milestone
articles.summary: IEEE Collabratec reached a milestone in August: more than 100,000 IEEE members (plus 250,000 nonmembers) on the online networking platform. articles.title: AI Expands the Search for New Battery Materials

articles.title: Where Will Taiwan Get Energy After Its Failed Nuclear Referendum?
articles.summary: Taiwan failed to pass an August referendum on whether or not a nuclear plant should be restarted, if it were deemed safe to operate.
